LGBTQIA+.title: Mentoring Womxn in Archaeology
LGBTQIA+.description: An inclusive, diverse and welcoming group for all who feel underrepresented in the archaeology and heritage disciplines.

LGBTQIA+.title: British Women Archaeologists
LGBTQIA+.description: A public Facebook group for women in archaeology.

LGBTQIA+.title: Queer as Funghi
LGBTQIA+.description: Information, workshops and more, focusing around the harvest and study of fungi.

LGBTQIA+.title: Queer Archaeology
LGBTQIA+.description: For all things Queer and archaeological.

LGBTQIA+.title: Vikings are Gay!
LGBTQIA+.description: A short podcast series that challenges the popular masculine image of Norse culture.

Accessibility.title: Vocal Eyes
Accessibility.description: Bringing theatre, museums, galleries and heritage sites to life for blind and partially sighted people.

Accessibility.title: The Enabled Archaeology Group
Accessibility.description: A Facebook group for those with any disability.

Accessibility.description: To empower, enable & combat negative attitudes towards the involvement of disabled people in Heritage.

Accessibility.title: Operation Nightingale
Accessibility.description: Initiative for military veterans controlled by the Ministry of Defence (MOD).

Accessibility.description: Provides specialist transcription and captioning services with a social impact.

Communities Experiencing Racial Inequali.description: A collective of anti-racist archaeologists, led by women of colour.

Communities Experiencing Racial Inequali.title: Black History Walks
Communities Experiencing Racial Inequali.description: Offering walking tours, educational talks and films in London.

Communities Experiencing Racial Inequali.title: Black Girls Hike UK
Communities Experiencing Racial Inequali.description: Provides a safe space for Black women to explore the outdoors. Challenging the status quo, and encouraging black women to reconnect with nature.

Communities Experiencing Racial Inequali.title: Run the Check
Communities Experiencing Racial Inequali.description: Promoting paid opportunities for creatives, including those for minority groups.

Communities Experiencing Racial Inequali.title: Museum Detox
Communities Experiencing Racial Inequali.description: The network for museum and heritage workers who identify as of colour.

Communities Experiencing Racial Inequali.title: Society of Black Archaeologists
Communities Experiencing Racial Inequali.description: Promoting academic excellence and social responsibility by creating a space for Black archaeologists and other scholars who support SBA's goals and activities.

Communities Experiencing Racial Inequali.description: Combatting the inaccessibility of archaeology and the outdoors for people of colour.

Communities Experiencing Racial Inequali.description: A global Twitter community of Black people in the Arts & Humanities.

Communities Experiencing Racial Inequali.title: Black Cultural Archives
Communities Experiencing Racial Inequali.description: Black Cultural Archives is the only national heritage centre dedicated to collecting, preserving and celebrating the histories of African and Caribbean people in Britain.

Communities Experiencing Racial Inequali.title: Migration Museum

Communities Experiencing Racial Inequali.description: The UK's leading independent race equality think tank.

Communities Experiencing Racial Inequali.title: The Peace Museum

Communities Experiencing Racial Inequali.title: ASRA Club
Communities Experiencing Racial Inequali.description: Run Club and community space centering Muslim women in sports, wellness, and sisterhood.

Communities Experiencing Racial Inequali.title: Maslaha
Communities Experiencing Racial Inequali.description: Creatively tackling longstanding social issues and systems of inequality that affect Muslim communities.
